avdta.network.node.policy

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.policy.Bid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This represents a bid by a specific Vehicle. The bid could be for other Vehicles to move.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bid(Vehicle v, double amount)
      Constructs the bid for the specified Vehicle and with the specified amount

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAmount()
      Returns the value of the bid
      Vehicle getVehicle()
      Returns the Vehicle placing the bid
      void pay()
      This is called when an auction is won.
